channel.title: Coding Conundrums Community
channel.description: Recent content on Coding Conundrums Community

item.title: Pathfinder
item.description: Problem statement Given an n-by-n grid, what is the most efficient route from the leftmost corner to the rightmost one? Sample input 1 4 8 19 2 5 12 6 3 7 18 20 14 17 22 16 10 15 21 9 11 24 23 13 12 Expected output Grid: [[1, 4, 8, 19, 2], [5, 12, 6, 3, 7], [18, 20, 14, 17, 22], [16, 10, 15, 21, 9], [11, 24, 23, 13, 12]] Smallest path: [1, 5, 18, 16, 11, 24, 10, 20, 12, 4, 8, 6, 14, 15, 23, 13, 12] Sum: 212 Pseudocode Create an array/dictionary to store visited nodes.
